titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Hemingway [video recording] : his sister Sunny talks about the formative years up in Michigan / a Dave Fortin production ; featuring reporter Dave Fortin ; also featuring Ken Marek.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Hemingway [video recording] : his sister Sunny talks about the formative years up in Michigan / a Dave Fortin production ; featuring reporter Dave Fortin ; also featuring Ken Marek.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: [Traverse City, Mich.] : Dave Fortin Productions, c1988.

archdesc.scopecontent: Includes interviews with Sunny Hemingway Miller and Ken Marek relating to Ernest Hemingway's experiences in northern Michigan, especially the Walloon Lake area.
